verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה בְּמַדְבְּרָא דְסִינַי בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא בְּחַד לְיַרְחָא תִנְיָנָא בְּשַׁתָּא תִנְיֵתָא לְמִפַּקְהוֹן מֵאַרְעָא דְמִצְרַיִם לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy spoke to Moshe in the Sinai desert, in the Tent of Meeting, on the first [day] of the second month, in the second year of their exodus from the land of Egypt, saying:

verses.ar_he: קַבִּילוּ יָת חֻשְׁבַּן כָּל כְּנִשְׁתָּא דִּבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן כָּל דְכוּרָא לְגֻלְגְלַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Take a head count [the sum] of the entire congregation of Bnei Yisroel according to their families to the house of their fathers counting the names of all males individually.

verses.ar_he: מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כָּל נָפֵק חֵילָא בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל תִּמְנוּן יָתְהוֹן לְחֵילֵיהוֹן אַתְּ וְאַהֲרֹן
verses.ar_en: From twenty years old and above, all those eligible for the army [who go to war] of Israel, you shall count them according to their divisions, you and Aharon.

verses.ar_he: וְעִמְכוֹן יְהוֹן גַבְרָא גַבְרָא לְשִׁבְטָא גְבַר רֵישׁ לְבֵית אֲבָהָתוֹהִי הוּא
verses.ar_en: Along with you, there shall be one man for each tribe, each man shall be the head of his fathers’ house.

verses.ar_he: וְאִלֵין שְׁמָהַת גֻבְרַיָא דִי יְקוּמוּן עִמְכוֹן לִרְאוּבֵן אֶלִיצוּר בַּר שְׁדֵיאוּר
verses.ar_en: These are the names of the men who shall stand along with you. For [the tribe of] Reuven, Elitzur the son of Shdeiur.

verses.ar_he: לְשִׁמְעוֹן שְׁלֻמִיאֵל בַּר צוּרִישַׁדָי
verses.ar_en: For [the tribe of] Shimon, Shlumiel the son of Tzurishadai.

verses.ar_he: לִיהוּדָה נַחְשׁוֹן בַּר עַמִינָדָב
verses.ar_en: For [the tribe of] Yehudah, Nachshon the son of Aminadav.

verses.ar_he: לְיִשָׂשׂכָר נְתַנְאֵל בַּר צוּעָר
verses.ar_en: For [the tribe of] Yissachar, Nesanel the son of Tzu’ar.

verses.ar_he: לִזְבוּלֻן אֱלִיאָב בַּר חֵלֹן
verses.ar_en: For [the tribe of] Zevulun, Eliav the son of Cheilon.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי יוֹסֵף לְאֶפְרַיִם אֱלִישָׁמָע בַּר עַמִיהוּד לִמְנַשֶׁה גַמְלִיאֵל בַּר פְּדָהצוּר
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Yoseif, for [the tribe of] Ephraim, Elishamah the son of Amihud. For [the tribe of] Menasheh, Gamliel the son of Pedahtzur.

verses.ar_he: לְבִנְיָמִן אֲבִידָן בַּר גִדְעֹנִי
verses.ar_en: For [the tribe of] Binyamin, Avidan the son of Gid’oni.

verses.ar_he: לְדָן אֲחִיעֶזֶר בַּר עַמִישַׁדָי
verses.ar_en: For [the tribe of] Don, Achiezer the son of Amishadai.

verses.ar_he: לְאָשֵׁר פַּגְעִיאֵל בַּר עָכְרָן
verses.ar_en: For [the tribe of] Asher, Pagi’el the son of Ochran.

verses.ar_he: לְגָד אֶלְיָסָף בַּר דְעוּאֵל
verses.ar_en: For [the tribe of] Gad, Elyasaf the son of De’uel.

verses.ar_he: לְנַפְתָּלִי אֲחִירַע בַּר עֵינָן
verses.ar_en: For [the tribe of] Naftali, Achira the son of Einan.

verses.ar_he: אִלֵין מְעַרְעֵי כְנִשְׁתָּא רַבְרְבֵי שִׁבְטֵי אֲבָהַתְהוֹן רֵישֵׁי אַלְפַיָא דְיִשְׂרָאֵל אִנוּן
verses.ar_en: These are the ones called from the congregation, the leaders of their fathers’ tribes; they are the heads of the thousands of Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וּדְבַר משֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן יָת גֻבְרַיָא הָאִלֵין דִי אִתְפָּרָשׁוּ בִּשְׁמָהָן
verses.ar_en: Moshe and Aharon took these men who were designated by name.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת כָּל כְּנִשְׁתָּא אַכְנָשׁוּ בְּחַד לְיַרְחָא תִנְיָנָא וְאִתְיַחֲסוּ עַל זַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא לְגֻלְגְלַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: They gathered together the entire congregation on the first [day] of the second month and they were registered by family ancestry according to the house of their fathers. according to the number of names each man of twenty years and above; individually.

verses.ar_he: כְּמָא דִי פַקֵד יְיָ יָת משֶׁה וּמְנָנוּן בְּמַדְבְּרָא דְסִינָי
verses.ar_en: Just as Adonoy commanded Moshe. He counted them in the Sinai desert.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲווֹ בְנֵי רְאוּבֵן בּוּכְרָא דְיִשְׂרָאֵל תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן לְגֻלְגְלַתְהוֹן כָּלּ דְכוּרָא מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: These were the sons of Reuven, Yisroel’s firstborn, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers. according to the number of individual names every male of twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָא דִרְאוּבֵן אַרְבְּעִין וְשִׁתָּא אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their nunbers, for the tribe of Reuven, is forty-six thousand five hundred.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי שִׁמְעוֹן תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן מִנְיָנוֹהִי בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן לְגֻלְגְלַתְהוֹן כָּל דְכוּרָא מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Shimon, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, his numbers according to the number of individual names every male of twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָּא דְשִׁמְעוֹן חַמְשִׁין וּתְשַׁע אַלְפִין וּתְלַת מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Shimon, is fifty-nine thousand three hundred.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי גָד תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Gad, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers in a counting of names. From twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָא דְּגָד אַרְבְּעִין וְחַמְשָׁא אַלְפִין וְשִׁית מְאָה וְחַמְשִׁין
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Gad, is forty-five thousand six hundred and fifty.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי יְהוּדָה תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Yehudah, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, in a counting of names. From twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָּא דִיהוּדָה שַׁבְעִין וְאַרְבְּעָא אַלְפִין וְשִׁית מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Yehudah, is seventy-four thousand six hundred.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי יִשָׂשכָר תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Yissachar, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, in a counting of names. From twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָא דְיִשָׂשכָר חַמְשִׁין וְאַרְבְּעָא אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Yissachar is fifty-four thousand four hundred.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי זְבוּלֻן תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָּא כֹל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Zevulun, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, in a counting of names from twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָא דִזְבוּלֻן חַמְשִׁין וּשְׁבַע אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Zevulun, is fifty-seven thousand four hundred.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי יוֹסֵף לִבְנֵי אֶפְרַיִם תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Yoseif; For the sons of Ephraim their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, in a counting of names from twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָא דְאֶפְרָיִם אַרְבְּעִין אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Ephraim is forty thousand five hundred.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי מְנַשֶׁה תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Menashe, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, in a counting of names from twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָא דִמְנַשֶׁה תְּלָתִין וּתְרֵין אַלְפִין וּמָאתָן
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Menashe is thirty-two thousand two hundred.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי בִנְיָמִן תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Binyamin, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, in a counting of names from twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָא דְבִנְיָמִן תְּלָתִין וְחַמְשָׁא אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers for the tribe of Binyamin, is thirty-five thousand four hundred.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי דָן תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Don, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, in a counting of names from twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָּא דְדָן שִׁתִּין וּתְרֵין אַלְפִין וּשְׁבַע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Don, is sixty-two thousand seven hundred.

verses.ar_he: לִבְנֵי אָשֵׁר תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: For the sons of Asher, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, in a counting of names from twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָא דְאָשֵׁר אַרְבְּעִין וְחַד אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Asher is forty-one thousand five hundred.

verses.ar_he: בְּנֵי נַפְתָּלִי תּוּלְדַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כֹּל נָפֵק חֵילָא
verses.ar_en: The sons of Naftali, their births according to their families according to the house of their fathers, in a counting of names from twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army.

verses.ar_he: מִנְּיָנֵיהוֹן לְשִׁבְטָא דְנַפְתָּלִי חַמְשִׁין וּתְלָתָא אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, for the tribe of Naftali is fifty-three thousand four hundred.

verses.ar_he: אִלֵין מִנְיָנַיָא דִי מְנָא משֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן וְרַבְרְבֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל תְּרֵי עֲשַׂר גֻבְרִין גַבְרָא חַד לְבֵית אֲבָהָתוֹהִי הֲווֹ
verses.ar_en: These are the numbers which were counted [by] Moshe, Aharon and the leaders of Israel, [being] twelve men, each man was the head of his fathers’ house.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲווֹ כָּל מִנְיָנֵי בְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן מִבַּר עַשְׂרִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא כָּל נָפֵק חֵילָא בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: All the numbers of Bnei Yisroel according to the house of their fathers, from twenty years and above, all who go forth into the army of Israel,

verses.ar_he: וַהֲווֹ כָּל מִנְיָנַיָא שִׁית מְאָה וּתְלָתָא אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה וְחַמְשִׁין
verses.ar_en: All their numbers were six hundred and three thousand five hundred and fifty.

verses.ar_he: וְלֵוָאֵי לְשִׁבְטָא דַאֲבָהַתְהוֹן לָא אִתְמְנִיאוּ בֵּינֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The Levites, according to the tribe of their fathers were not counted among them.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: בְּרַם יָת שִׁבְטָא דְלֵוִי לָא תִמְנֵי וְיָת חֻשְׁבַּנְהוֹן לָא תְקַבֵּל בְּגוֹ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: However, the tribe of Levi you shall not count and you shall not take [accept] their head count among Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וְאַתְּ מַנִי יָת לֵוָאֵי עַל מַשְׁכְּנָא דְסַהֲדוּתָא וְעַל כָּל מָנוֹהִי וְעַל כָּל דִּי לֵהּ אִנּוּן יִטְלוּן יָת מַשְׁכְּנָא וְיָת כָּל מָנוֹהִי וְאִנוּן יְשַׁמְשֻׁנֵהּ וּסְחוֹר סְחוֹר לְמַשְׁכְּנָא יִשְׁרוּן
verses.ar_en: You shall appoint the Levites to oversee the Mishkon of Testimony and over all of its utensils and over all that belongs to it. They shall carry the Mishkon and all its utensils, and they shall administer it, and they shall camp around the Mishkon.

verses.ar_he: וּבְמֵטַל מַשְׁכְּנָא יְפַרְקוּן יָתֵהּ לֵוָאֵי וּבְמִשְׁרֵי מַשְׁכְּנָא יְקִימוּן יָתֵהּ לֵוָאֵי וְחִלוֹנַי דְיִקְרַב יִתְקְטֵל
verses.ar_en: When the Mishkon is to be moved the Levites shall take it down, and when the Mishkon is to rest [in one place] the Levites shall erect it, and the stranger who approaches, shall die.

verses.ar_he: וְיִשְׁרוּן בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל גְבַר עַל מַשְׁרוֹהִי וּגְבַר עַל טִּקְסֵהּ לְחֵילֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Bnei Yisroel shall camp, each man at his own camp and each man at his own banner, according to their divisions.

verses.ar_he: וְלֵוָאֵי יִשְׁרוּן סְחוֹר סְחוֹר לְמַשְׁכְּנָא דְסַהַדוּתָא וְלָא יְהֵי רוּגְזָא עַל כְּנִשְׁתָּא דִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְיִטְרוּן לֵוָאֵי יָת מַטְרַת מַשְׁכְּנָא דְסַהֲדוּתָא
verses.ar_en: The Levites shall camp around the Mishkon of the Testimony, so that there will not be anger upon the congregation of Bnei Yisroel, and the Levites shall be careful to preserve the Mishkon of Testimony.

verses.ar_he: וַעֲבָדוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל כְּכֹל דִּי פַּקֵיד יְיָ יָת משֶׁה כֵּן עֲבָדוּ
verses.ar_en: Bnei Yisroel did according to all that Adonoy commanded Moshe; they did it [exactly].

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה וְעִם אַהֲרֹן לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe and to Aharon, saying;

verses.ar_he: גְבַר עַל טִּקְסֵהּ בְּאַתְוָן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן יִשְׁרוּן בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מִלָקֳבֵל סְחוֹר סְחוֹר לְמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא יִשְׁרוּן
verses.ar_en: Each man at his own banner, with the insignia of their fathers’ houses shall Bnei Yisroel encamp, at a distance around the Tent of Meeting they shall encamp.

verses.ar_he: וְדִי שְׁרַן קִדוּמָא מַדִינְחָא טֵקַס מַשְׁרִית יְהוּדָה לְחֵילֵיהוֹן וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי יְהוּדָה נַחְשׁוֹן בַּר עַמִינָדָב
verses.ar_en: Those whose camp is in the forefront, on the eastern side is the camp of the banner of Yehudah according to their divisions, and the leader of the sons of Yehudah is Nachshon the son of Aminadav.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵיהּ וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן שַׁבְעִין וְאַרְבְּעָא אַלְפִין וְשִׁית מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its division and their numbers is seventy-four thousand six hundred.

verses.ar_he: וְדִי שְׁרַן סְמִיכִין עֲלוֹהִי שִׁבְטָא דְיִשָׂשכָר וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי יִשָׂשכָר נְתַנְאֵל בַּר צוּעָר
verses.ar_en: Those who camp along with [near] him are; the tribe of Yissachar, and the leader of the sons of Yissachar is Nesanel the son of Tzu’ar.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנוֹהִי חַמְשִׁין וְאַרְבְּעָא אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its division and its numbers is fifty-four thousand four hundred.

verses.ar_he: שִׁבְטָא דִזְבוּלֻן וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי זְבוּלֻן אֱלִיאָב בַּר חֵלוֹן
verses.ar_en: The tribe of Zevulun, and the leader of the sons of Zevulun is Eliav the son of Cheilon.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנוֹהִי חַמְשִׁין וְשַׁבְעָא אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its division and its numbers is fifty-seven thousand four hundred.

verses.ar_he: כָּל מִנְיָנַיָא לְמַשְׁרִית יְהוּדָה מְאָה וּתְמָנָן וְשִׁתָּא אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה לְחֵילֵיהוֹן בְּקַדְמֵיתָא נַטְלִין
verses.ar_en: The total numbers for the encampment of Yehudah is one hundred eighty-six thousand four hundred according to their divisions, [and] they travel [in the] first [position].

verses.ar_he: טֵקַס מַשְׁרִית רְאוּבֵן דָרוֹמָא לְחֵילֵיהוֹן וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי רְאוּבֵן אֱלִיצוּר בַּר שְׁדֵיאוּר
verses.ar_en: The banner of the camp of Reuven is on the south side, according to their divisions, and the leader of the sons of Reuven is Elitzur the son of Shdeiur.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנוֹהִי אַרְבְּעִין וְשִׁתָּא אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its divisions and its numbers is forty-six thousand five hundred.

verses.ar_he: וְדִי שְׁרַן סְמִיכִין עֲלוֹהִי שִׁבְטָא דְשִׁמְעוֹן וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי שִׁמְעוֹן שְׁלֻמִיאֵל בַּר צוּרִישַׁדָי
verses.ar_en: Those who camp along with him are; the tribe of Shimon, and the leader of the tribe of Shimon is Shlumiel the son of Tzurishadai.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן חַמְשִׁין וּתְשַׁע אַלְפִין וּתְלַת מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its division and their numbers is fifty-nine thousand three hundred;

verses.ar_he: וְשִׁבְטָא דְגָד וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי גָד אֶלְיָסָף בַּר רְעוּאֵל
verses.ar_en: The tribe of Gad, and the leader of the sons of Gad is Elyasaf the son of Re’uel.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן אַרְבְּעִין וְחַמְשָׁא אַלְפִין וְשִׁית מְאָה וְחַמְשִׁין
verses.ar_en: Its division and their numbers is forty-five thousand six hundred fifty.

verses.ar_he: כָּל מִנְיָנַיָא לְמַשְׁרִית רְאוּבֵן מְאָה וְחַמְשִׁין וְחַד אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה וְחַמְשִׁין לְחֵילֵיהוֹן בְּתִנְיֵתָא נַטְלִין
verses.ar_en: The total numbers for the encampment of Reuven is one hundred fifty-one thousand four hundred and fifty, according to their division, and they travel [in the] second [position].

verses.ar_he: וְנַטֵל מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא מַשְׁרִית לֵוָאֵי בְּגוֹ מַשִּׁרְיָתָא כְּמָא דְשָׁרַן כֵּן נָטְלִין גְבַר עַל אַתְרֵהּ לְטִקְסֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The Tent of Meeting shall travel [along with] the camp of the Levites in the center of the [other] camps, just as they camp so shall they travel, each man in his place according to their [various] banners.

verses.ar_he: טֵּקַס מַשְׁרִית אֶפְרַיִם לְחֵילֵיהוֹן מַעַרְבָא וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי אֶפְרַיִם אֱלִישָׁמָע בַּר עַמִיהוּד
verses.ar_en: The banner of the camp of Ephraim, according to their divisions is on the west side, and the leader of the sons of Ephraim is Elishamah the son of Amihud.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן אַרְבְּעִין אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its division and their numbers is forty-thousand five hundred.

verses.ar_he: וְדִסְמִיכִין עֲלוֹהִי שִׁבְטָא דִמְנַשֶׁה וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי מְנַשֶׁה גַמְלִיאֵל בַּר פְדָהצוּר
verses.ar_en: Along with [near] him are; the tribe of Menashe, and the leader of the sons of Menashe is Gamliel the son of Pedahtzur.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן תְּלָתִין וּתְרֵין אַלְפִין וּמָאתָן
verses.ar_en: Its division and their numbers is thirty-two thousand two hundred.

verses.ar_he: וְשִׁבְטָא דְבִנְיָמִן וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי בִנְיָמִן אֲבִידָן בַּר גִדְעוֹנִי
verses.ar_en: The tribe of Binyamin, and the leader of the sons of Binyamin is Avidan the son of Gid’oni.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן תְּלָתִין וְחַמְשָׁא אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its division and their numbers is thirty-five thousand four hundred.

verses.ar_he: כָּל מִנְיָנַיָא לְמַשְׁרִית אֶפְרַיִם מְאָה וְתַמְנֵי אַלְפִין וּמְאָה לְחֵילֵיהוֹן בִּתְלִיתֵתָא נָטְלִין
verses.ar_en: The total numbers for the camp of Ephraim is one hundred eight thousand one hundred according to their divisions, and they travel [in the] third [position].

verses.ar_he: טֵקַס מַשְׁרִית דָן צִפּוּנָא לְחֵילֵיהוֹן וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי דָן אֲחִיעֶזֶר בַּר עַמִישַׁדָי
verses.ar_en: The banner of the camp of Don is on the north side according to their divisions, and the leader of the sons of Don is Achiezer the son of Amishadai.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן שִׁתִּין וּתְרֵין אַלְפִין וּשְׁבַע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its division and their numbers is sixty-two thousand seven hundred.

verses.ar_he: וְדִי שְׁרַן סְמִכִין עֲלוֹהִי שִׁבְטָא דְאָשֵׁר וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי אָשֵׁר פַּגְעִיאֵל בַּר עָכְרָן
verses.ar_en: Those who camp with him are; the tribe of Asher, and the leader of the sons of Asher is Pagi’el the son of Ochran.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן אַרְבְּעִין וְחַד אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its divisions and their numbers is forty-one thousand five hundred.

verses.ar_he: וְשִׁבְטָא דְנַפְתָּלִי וְרַבָּא לִבְנֵי נַפְתָּלִי אֲחִירַע בַּר עֵינָן
verses.ar_en: The tribe of Naftali, and the leader of the sons of Naftali is Achira the son of Einan.

verses.ar_he: וְחֵילֵהּ וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן חַמְשִׁין וּתְלָתָא אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Its divisions and their numbers is fifty-three thousand four hundred.

verses.ar_he: כָּל מִנְיָנַיָא לְמַשְׁרִית דָן מְאָה וְחַמְשִׁין וְשַׁבְעָא אַלְפִין וְשִׁית מְאָה בְּבַתְרֵתָא נָטְלִין לְטִקְסֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The total numbers for the encampment of Don is one hundred fifty-seven thousand six hundred and they travel [in the] last [position] according to their [various] banners.

verses.ar_he: אִלֵין מִנְיָנֵי בְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן כָּל מִנְיָנֵי מַשִׁרְיָתָא לְחֵילֵיהוֹן שִׁית מְאָהּ וּתְלָתָא אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה וְחַמְשִׁין
verses.ar_en: These are the numbers of Bnei Yisroel according to their fathers’ houses. The total numbers of the camps according to their divisions is six hundred three thousand five hundred fifty.

verses.ar_he: וְלֵוָאֵי לָא אִתְמְנִיאוּ בְּגוֹ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל כְּמָא דְפַקֵיד יְיָ יָת משֶׁה
verses.ar_en: The Levites were not counted among Bnei Yisroel just as Adonoy commanded Moshe.

verses.ar_he: וַעֲבָדוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל כְּכֹל דִי פַקֵיד יְיָ יָת משֶׁה כֵּן שָׁרַן לְטִּקְסֵיהוֹן וְכֵן נָטְלִין גְבַר לְזַרְעִיתֵיהּ עַל בֵּית אֲבָהָתוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: Bnei Yisroel did all which Adonoy commanded Moshe, so they camped according to their [various] banners and so they traveled, each man with his family according to his fathers’ house.

verses.ar_he: וְאִלֵין תּוּלְדַת אַהֲרֹן וּמשֶׁה בְּיוֹמָא דְמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה בְּטוּרָא דְסִינָי
verses.ar_en: These are the descendants of Aharon and Moshe on the day that Adonoy spoke to Moshe on Mount Sinai.

verses.ar_he: וְאִלֵין שְׁמָהַת בְּנֵי אַהֲרֹן בּוּכְרָא נָדָב וַאֲבִיהוּא אֶלְעָזָר וְאִיתָמָר
verses.ar_en: These are the names of Aharon’s sons; the firstborn, Nadav, and Avihu, Elazar and Isamar.

verses.ar_he: אִלֵין שְׁמָהַת בְּנֵי אַהֲרֹן כַּהֲנַיָא דְאִתְרַבִּיאוּ דִי אִתְקָרֵב קֻרְבַּנְהוֹן לְשַׁמָשָׁא
verses.ar_en: These are the names of Aharon’s sons, the anointed kohanim, whose hands are occupied with bringing offerings, to serve [God].

verses.ar_he: וּמִית נָדָב וַאֲבִיהוּא קֳדָם יְיָ בְּקָרוֹבֵיהוֹן אֶשָׁתָא נוּכְרֵיתָא קֳדָם יְיָ בְּמַדְבְּרָא דְסִינַי וּבְנִין לָא הֲווֹ לְהוֹן וְשַׁמֵּשׁ אֶלְעָזָר וְאִיתָמָר עַל אַפֵּי אַהֲרֹן אֲבוּהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Nadav and Avihu died in the presence of Adonoy, when they offered a strange fire-offering before Adonoy, in the Sinai desert, and they had no sons. [However] Elazar and Isamar served in the presence of their father Aharon.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: קָרֵב יָת שִׁבְטָּא דְלֵוִי וּתְקֵים יָתֵהּ קֳדָם אַהֲרֹן כַּהֲנָא וִישַׁמְשׁוּן יָתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Bring the tribe of Levi near and have it stand before Aharon the kohein, and they shall serve him.

verses.ar_he: וְיִטְרוּן יָת מַטַרְתֵּהּ וְיָת מַטְרַת כָּל כְּנִשְׁתָּא קֳדָם מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא לְמִפְלַח יָת פָּלְחַן מַשְׁכְּנָא
verses.ar_en: They shall take care to preserve his guardianship and the guardianship of the entire congregation before the Tent of Meeting, to serve in the service of the Mishkon.

verses.ar_he: וְיִטְרוּן יָת כָּל מָאנֵי מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא וְיָת מַטְּרַת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל לְמִפְלַח יָת פָּלְחַן מַשְׁכְּנָא
verses.ar_en: They shall guard all the utensils of the Tent of Meeting and the watch of Bnei Yisroel to serve in the service of the Mishkon.

verses.ar_he: וְתִתֵּן יָת לֵוָאֵי לְאַהֲרֹן וְלִבְנוֹהִי מְסִירִין יְהִיבִין אִנוּן לֵהּ מִן בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: You shall place the Levites in the charge of Aharon and his sons; they are presented [and given] to him from [among] Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת אַהֲרֹן וְיָת בְּנוֹהִי תְּמַנֵי וְיִטְרוּן יָת כְּהֻנַתְהוֹן וְחִלוֹנַי דְיִקְרַב יִתְקְטֵל
verses.ar_en: You shall appoint Aharon and his sons and they shall guard their priesthood, and an outsider (non-kohein) who comes near shall be put to death.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: וַאֲנָא הָא קְרֵבִית יָת לֵוָאֵי מִגוֹ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל חֲלַף כָּל בּוּכְרָא פְּתַח וַלְדָא מִבְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וִיהוֹן מְשַׁמְשִׁין קֳדָמַי לֵוָאֵי
verses.ar_en: Behold! I have taken the Levites from among Bnei Yisroel instead of all the firstborn who have opened the womb, among Bnei Yisroel, and [therefore] the Levites shall be Mine [serve before Me].

verses.ar_he: אֲרֵי דִילִי כָּל בּוּכְרָא בְּיוֹמָא דִקְטָלִית כָּל בּוּכְרָא בְּאַרְעָא דְמִצְרַיִם אַקְדֵשִׁית קֳדָמַי כָּל בּוּכְרָא בְּיִשְׂרָאֵל מֵאֱנָשָׁא עַד בְּעִירָא דִילִי יְהוֹן אֲנָא יְיָ
verses.ar_en: For all the firstborn are Mine, since on the day I smote all the firstborn in the land of Egypt I sanctified to [before] Me all the firstborn of Bnei Yisroel from man to beast; they shall be Mine, I am Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה בְּמַדְבְּרָא דְסִינַי לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe in the Sinai desert, saying;

verses.ar_he: מְנֵי יָת בְּנֵי לֵוִי לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן כָּל דְכוּרָא מִבַּר יַרְחָא וּלְעֵלָא תִּמְנִנוּן
verses.ar_en: Count the sons of Levi according to their fathers’ houses according to their families. All males from the age of one month and above, you shall count them.

verses.ar_he: וּמְנָא יָתְהוֹן משֶׁה עַל מֵימְרָא דַיְיָ כְּמָא דְאִתְפַּקָד
verses.ar_en: Moshe counted them according to the word of Adonoy, just as he was commanded.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲווֹ אִלֵין בְּנֵי לֵוִי בִּשְׁמָהַתְהוֹן גֵרְשׁוֹן וּקְהָת וּמְרָרִי
verses.ar_en: These were sons of Levi according to their names, Gershon, Kehos and Merori.

verses.ar_he: וְאִלֵין שְׁמָהַת בְּנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לִבְנִי וְשִׁמְעִי
verses.ar_en: These are the names of Gershon’s sons according to their families; Livni and Shim’i.

verses.ar_he: וּבְנֵי קְהָת לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן עַמְרָם וְיִצְהָר חֶבְרוֹן וְעֻזִיאֵל
verses.ar_en: The sons of Kehos, according to their families were; Amram, Yitzhar Chevron and Uziel.

verses.ar_he: וּבְנֵי מְרָרִי לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן מַחְלִי וּמוּשִׁי אִלֵין אִנוּן זַרְעֲיַת לֵוָאֵי לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The sons of Merori, according to their families were; Machli and Mushi. These are the families of Levi according to their fathers’ houses.

verses.ar_he: לְגֵרְשׁוֹן זַרְעִית לִבְנִי וְזַרְעִית שִׁמְעִי אִלֵין אִנוּן זַרְעֲיַת גֵרְשׁוֹן
verses.ar_en: Of Gershon, the family of Livni and the family of Shim’i. These are the families of the Gershonites.

verses.ar_he: מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן כָּל דְכוּרָא מִבַּר יַרְחָא וּלְעֵלָא מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן שַׁבְעָא אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, in a count of every male of one month and above; their numbers are seven thousand five hundred.

verses.ar_he: זַרְעֲיַת גֵרְשׁוֹן אֲחוֹרֵי מַשְׁכְּנָא יִשְּׁרוּן מַעַרְבָא
verses.ar_en: The families of the Gershonites shall camp behind the Mishkon on the west side.

verses.ar_he: וְרַב בֵּית אַבָּא לְבֵית גֵרְשׁוֹן אֶלְיָסָף בַּר לָאֵל
verses.ar_en: The leader of the household of the Gershonites is Elyasaf the son of Lael.

verses.ar_he: וּמַטְרַת בְּנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹן בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא מַשְׁכְּנָא וּפְרָסָא חוֹפָאֵהּ וּפְרָסָא דִתְרַע מַשְׁכַן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: The guardianship of the sons of Gershon in the Tent of Meeting [was]; the Mishkon and the Tent, its cover and the Curtain for the entrance of the Tent of Meeting,

verses.ar_he: וּסְרָדֵי דְדַרְתָּא וְיָת פְּרָסָא דִתְרַע דַרְתָּא דִי עַל מַשְׁכְּנָא וְעַל מַדְבְּחָא סְחוֹר סְחוֹר וְיָת אַטוּנוֹהִי לְכֹל פּוּלְחָנֵהּ
verses.ar_en: The hanging Curtains of the courtyard and the Curtain at the entrance of the courtyard which is around the Mishkon and Altar, and its ropes, for all of the work involving these things [its service].

verses.ar_he: וְלִקְהָת זַרְעִית עַמְרָם וְזַרְעִית יִצְהָר וְזַרְעִית חֶבְרוֹן וְזַרְעִית עֻזִיאֵל אִלֵין אִנוּן זַרְעֲיַת קְהָת
verses.ar_en: Of Kehos, was the family of Amram, the family of Yitzhar, the family of Chevron and the family of Uziel, these are the families of the Kehosites.

verses.ar_he: בְּמִנְיַן כָּל דְכוּרָא מִבַּר יַרְחָא וּלְעֵלָא תְּמַנְיָא אַלְפִין וְשִׁית מְאָה נַטְּרֵי מַטַרְתָּא דְקוּדְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: The number of every male from one month and above is eight thousand six hundred. [They were] the guardians of the sacred vessels.

verses.ar_he: זַרְעֲיַת בְּנֵי קְהָת יִשְׁרוּן עַל צִדָא דְמַשְׁכְּנָא דָרוֹמָא
verses.ar_en: The families of the children of Kehos shall camp on the south side of the Mishkon.

verses.ar_he: וְרַב בֵּית אַבָּא לְזַרְעֲיַת קְהָת אֱלִיצָפָן בַּר עֻזִיאֵל
verses.ar_en: The leader of the household of the families of the Kehosites, is Elitzafan the son of Uziel.

verses.ar_he: וּמַטַרְתְּהוֹן אֲרוֹנָא וּפְתוֹרָא וּמְנַרְתָּא וּמַדְבְּחַיָא וּמָנֵי קוּדְשָׁא דִי יְשַׁמְשׁוּן בְּהוֹן וּפְרָסָא וְכֹל פוּלְחָנֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Their guardianship is the Ark, the Table, the Menorah, the Altars and the sacred utensils with which they serve. And the Curtain, and all of the work involving these things.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַרְכְּלָא דִמְמַנָא עַל רַבְרְבֵי לֵוָאֵי אֶלְעָזָר בַּר אַהֲרֹן כַּהֲנָא דְמִתְּחוֹת יְדוֹהִי מְמַנָן נָטְרֵי מַטְרַת קוּדְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: The leader of the leaders of Levi shall be Elazar, the son of Aharon, the kohein [who is] in charge of the appointment of the guardians to safeguard the holy [Sanctuary].

verses.ar_he: לִמְרָרִי זַרְעִית מַחְלִי וְזַרְעִית מוּשִׁי אִלֵין אִנוּן זַרְעֲיַת מְרָרִי
verses.ar_en: Of Merori, was the family of Machli and the family and Mushi; these are the families of the Merorites.

verses.ar_he: וּמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן בְּמִנְיַן כָּל דְכוּרָא מִבַּר יַרְחָא וּלְעֵלָא שִׁתָּא אַלְפִין וּמָאתָן
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, in a count of every male of one month and above, is six thousand two hundred.

verses.ar_he: וְרַב בֵּית אַבָּא לְזַרְעֲיַת מְרָרִי צוּרִיאֵל בַּר אֲבִיחָיִל עַל צִדָא דְמַשְׁכְּנָא יִשְׁרוּן צִפּוּנָא
verses.ar_en: The leader of the household of the families of the Merorites is Tzuriel the son of Avichail, they shall camp on the north side of the Mishkon.

verses.ar_he: וְדִי מְסִיר לְמַטְרַת בְּנֵי מְרָרִי דַפֵּי מַשְׁכְּנָא וְעַבְרוֹהִי וְעַמוּדוֹהִי וְסַמְכוֹהִי וְכָל מָנוֹהִי וְכֹל פּוּלְחָנֵהּ
verses.ar_en: The appointed task of the guardianship of the sons of Merori shall be the beams of the Mishkon, its bars, pillars and sockets; all of its utensils, and all of the work involving these things [its service].

verses.ar_he: וְעַמוּדֵי דְדַרְתָּא סְחוֹר סְחוֹר וְסַמְכֵיהוֹן וְסִכֵּיהוֹן וְאַטוּנֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Also the pillars of the surrounding courtyard and their sockets, pegs and ropes.

verses.ar_he: וְדִי שְׁרַן קֳדָם מַשְׁכְּנָא קִדוּמָא קֳדָם מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא מַדִינְחָא משֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן וּבְנוֹהִי נָטְרִין מַטְרַת מַקְדְשָׁא לְמַטְרַת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְחִילוֹנַי דְיִקְרַב יִתְקְטֵל
verses.ar_en: Those who camped in front of the Mishkon in the forefront, in front of the Tent of Meeting on the east side [are]; Moshe, Aharon and his sons, guardians of the guardianship of the Sanctuary to guard on behalf of Bnei Yisroel. Any outsider (non-kohein) who comes near, shall be put to death.

verses.ar_he: כָּל מִנְיָנֵי לֵוָאֵי דִי מְנָא משֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן עַל מֵימְרָא דַיְיָ לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן כָּל דְכוּרָא מִבַּר יַרְחָא וּלְעֵלָא עַשְׂרִין וּתְרֵין אַלְפִין
verses.ar_en: The number of all the Levites whom Moshe and Aharon counted at the word of Adonoy according to their families; every male from one month and above was twenty-two thousand.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר יְיָ לְמשֶׁה מְנֵי כָּל בּוּכְרַיָא דִכְרַיָא לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מִבַּר יַרְחָא וּלְעֵלָא וְקַבֵּל יָת מִנְיַן שְׁמָהַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Adonoy said to Moshe: Count every male firstborn of Bnei Yisroel from the age of one month and above and take the number of their names.

verses.ar_he: וּתְקָרֵב יָת לֵוָאֵי קֳדָמַי אֲנָא יְיָ חֲלַף כָּל בּוּכְרָא בִּבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְיָת בְּעִירָא דְלֵוָאֵי חֲלַף כָּל בּוּכְרָא בִּבְעִירָא דִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: You shall take the Levites for [before] Me, I, [who am] Adonoy, instead of every firstborn of Bnei Yisroel; and the animals of the Levites instead of every firstborn among the animals of Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וּמְנָא משֶׁה כְּמָא דִי פַקֵיד יְיָ יָתֵהּ יָת כָּל בּוּכְרָא בִּבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: Moshe counted just as Adonoy commanded him to, every firstborn of Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲווֹ כָל בּוּכְרַיָא דִכְרַיָא בְּמִנְיַן שְׁמָהָן מִבַּר יַרְחָא וּלְעֵלָא לְמִנְיָנֵיהוֹן עַשְׂרִין וּתְרֵין אַלְפִין מָאתָן וְשַׁבְעִין וּתְלָתָא
verses.ar_en: Every male firstborn according to the number of names of one month and above according to their numbers, was twenty-two thousand two hundred and seventy-three.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְּמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying:

verses.ar_he: קָרֵב יָת לֵוָאֵי חֲלַף כָּל בּוּכְרָא בִּבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְיָת בְּעִירָא דְלֵוָאֵי חֲלַף בְּעִירְהוֹן וִיהוֹן מְשַּׁמְשִׁין קֳדָמַי לֵוָאֵי אֲנָא יְיָ
verses.ar_en: Take the Levites instead of every firstborn of Bnei Yisroel, and the animals of the Levites instead of their animals, and the Levites shall [serve before Me] be Mine, I am Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת פּוּרְקַן מָאתָן וְשַׁבְעִין וּתְלָתָא דְיַתִּירִין עַל לֵוָאֵי מִבּוּכְרַיָא דִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: And the redemption of the two hundred and seventy-three that are in excess of the number of Levites from the firstborns of Bnei Yisroel.

verses.ar_he: וְתִסַב חָמֵשׁ חָמֵשׁ סִלְעִין לְגֻלְגַלְתָּא בְּסִלְעֵי קוּדְשָׁא תִּסַב עַשְׂרִין מָעִין סִלְעָא
verses.ar_en: You shall take five shekolim apiece from each individual; you shall take it in holy shekolim at twenty gerah for each shekel.

verses.ar_he: וְתִתֵּן כַּסְפָּא לְאַהֲרֹן וְלִבְנוֹהִי פֻּרְקַן דְיַתִּירִין בְּהוֹן
verses.ar_en: You shall give the money to Aharon and to his sons as a redemption for those whose numbers are in excess [of the Levites.]

verses.ar_he: וּנְסֵיב משֶׁה יָת כְּסַף פּוּרְקָנָא מִן דְיַתִּירִין עַל פְּרִיקֵי לֵוָאֵי
verses.ar_en: Moshe took the redemption money from those whose numbers were in excess of those who were redeemed through the Levites.

verses.ar_he: מִן בּוּכְרַיָא דִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל נְסִיב יָת כַּסְפָּא אֲלַף וּתְלַת מְאָה וְשִׁתִּין וְחָמֵשׁ סִלְעִין בְּסִלְעֵי קוּדְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: From the firstborn of Bnei Yisroel, he took the money. One thousand three hundred sixty-five, in holy shekel.

verses.ar_he: וִיהַב משֶׁה יָת כְּסַף פְּרִיקַיָא לְאַהֲרֹן וְלִבְנוֹהִי עַל מֵימְרָא דַיְיָ כְּמָא דִי פַקֵיד יְיָ יָת משֶׁה
verses.ar_en: Moshe gave the money of those who were redeemed to Aharon and to his sons according to the word of Adonoy, just as Adonoy commanded to Moshe.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה וְעִם אַהֲרֹן לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe and to Aharon, saying;

verses.ar_he: קַבִּילוּ יָת חֻשְׁבַּן בְּנֵי קְהָת מִגוֹ בְּנֵי לֵוִי לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Take the count of the sons of Kehos from among the sons of Levi according to their families according to the house of their fathers.

verses.ar_he: מִבַּר תְּלָתִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא וְעַד בַּר חַמְשִׁין שְׁנִין כָּל דְאָתֵי לְחֵילָא לְמֶעְבַּד עִבִדְתָּא בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִ מְ נָא
verses.ar_en: From thirty years and above until fifty years, all who enter into the division to perform service in the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: דֵין פּוּלְחַן בְּנֵי קְהָת בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא קוֹדֶשׁ קוּדְשַׁיָא
verses.ar_en: This is the service of the sons of Kehos in the Tent of Meeting, the Holy of Holies.

verses.ar_he: וְיֵיעוֹל אַהֲרֹן וּבְנוֹהִי בְּמֵטַל מַשְׁרִיתָא וִיפָרְקוּן יָת פָּרֻכְתָּא דִפְרָסָא וִיכַסוּן בַּהּ יָת אֲרוֹנָא דְסַהֲדוּתָא
verses.ar_en: Aharon and his sons shall enter when the camp is about to travel, and take down the screening curtain and, with it they shall cover the Ark of the Testimony.

verses.ar_he: וְיִתְּנוּן עֲלוֹהִי חוֹפָאָה דִמְשַׁךְ סַסְגוֹנָא וְיִפְרְסוּן לְבוּשׁ גְמִיר תִּכְלָא מִלְעֵלָא וִישַׁוּוּן אֲרִיחוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: They shall place upon it a covering of tachash [multi-colored]-hide and spread an entirely blue woolen cloth on top of it, and put its [carrying] poles [in place].

verses.ar_he: וְעַל פָּתוֹרָא דִלְחֵם אַפַּיָא יִפְרְסוּן לְבוּשׁ תִּכְלָא וְיִתְּנוּן עֲלוֹהִי יָת מָגִּיסַיָא וְיָת בָּזִיכַיָא וְיָת מְכִילָתָא וְיָת קַסְווֹת נִסוּכָא וְלַחְמָא תְּדִירָא עֲלוֹהִי יְהֵי
verses.ar_en: On the Show Table [table of the show bread] they shall spread a blue woolen cloth and they shall place upon it the molds, spoons, rods and the covering props, and the continual bread shall be upon it [continually].

verses.ar_he: וְיִפְרְסוּן עֲלֵיהוֹן לְבוּשׁ צְבַע זְהוֹרִי וִיכַסוּן יָתֵהּ בְּחוֹפָאָה דִמְשַׁךְ סַסְגוֹנָא וִישַׁוּוּן יָת אֲרִיחוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: They shall spread upon them a cloth of crimson thread and they shall cover it with a covering of tachash [multi-colored]-hide and put its [carrying] poles [in place].

verses.ar_he: וְיִסְבוּן לְבוּשׁ תִּכְלָא וִיכַסוּן יָת מְנַרְתָּא דְאַנְהוֹרֵי וְיָת בּוֹצִינָהָא וְיָת צִבְתָהָא וְיָת מַחְתְּיָתָהָא וְיָת כָּל מָנֵי מִשְׁחָא דִי יְשַׁמְשׁוּן לָהּ בְּהוֹן
verses.ar_en: They shall take a blue woolen cloth and they shall cover the Menorah that illuminates and its lamps, its tongs and its scoops and all of its oil vessels; those with which you use to perform its service.

verses.ar_he: וְיִתְּנוּן יָתָהּ וְיָת כָּל מָנָהָא לְחוֹפָאָה דִמְשַׁךְ סַסְגוֹנָא וְיִתְּנוּן עַל אֲרִיחָא
verses.ar_en: They shall put it and all of its utensils into the covering of the tachash [multi-colored]-hide and put it on the carrying frame.

verses.ar_he: וְעַל מַדְבְּחָא דְדַהֲבָא יִפְרְסוּן לְבוּשׁ תִּכְלָא וִיכַסוּן יָתֵהּ בְּחוֹפָאָה דִמְשַׁךְ סַסְגוֹנָא וִישַׁוּוּן יָת אֲרִיחוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: On top of the golden Altar they shall spread a blue woolen cloth and they shall cover it with a covering of tachash [multi-colored]-hide, and put its [carrying] poles in place.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסְבוּן יָת כָּל מָנֵי שִׁמוּשָׁא דִי יְשַׁמְשׁוּן בְּהוֹן בְּקוּדְשָׁא וְיִתְּנוּן לִלְבוּשׁ תִּכְלָא וִיכַסוּן יָתְהוֹן בְּחוֹפָאָה דִמְשַׁךְ סַסְגוֹנָא וְיִתְּנוּן עַל אֲרִיחָא
verses.ar_en: They shall take all the service utensils with which they serve in the Sanctuary and they shall put them inside a blue woolen cloth, and they shall cover them with a covering of tachash [multi-colored]-hide, and put it on the carrying frame.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסְפוּן יָת קִטְמָא דְמַדְבְּחָא וְיִפְרְסוּן עֲלוֹהִי לְבוּשׁ אַרְגְוָן
verses.ar_en: They shall remove the ashes from [atop] the Altar and they shall spread upon it a cloth of purple [wool].

verses.ar_he: וְיִתְּנוּן עֲלוֹהִי יָת כָּל מָנוֹהִי דִי יְשַׁמְשׁוּן עֲלוֹהִי בְהוֹן יָת מַחְתְּיָתָא וְיָת צִנוֹרְיָתָא וְיָת מַגְרוֹפְיָתָא וְיָת מִזְרְקַיָא כֹּל מָנֵי מַדְבְּחָא וְיִפְרְסוּן עֲלוֹהִי חוֹפָאָה דִמְשַׁךְ סַסְגוֹנָא וִישַׁווּן אֲרִיחוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: They shall put upon it all of its utensils which they use in service, those that are used on the Altar-top; the firepans, forks, scoops and sprinklers, all the utensils of the Altar. They shall spread upon it a covering of tachash [multi-colored]-hide, and put its [carrying] poles in place.

verses.ar_he: וִישֵׁיצֵי אַהֲרֹן וּבְנוֹהִי לְכַסָאָה יָת קוּדְשָׁא וְיָת כָּל מָנֵי קוּדְשָׁא בְּמֵטַל מַשְׁרִיתָא וּבָתַר כֵּן יַעֲלוּן בְּנֵי קְהָת לְמִטַּל וְלָא יִקְרְבוּן לְקוּדְשָׁא וְלָא יְמוּתוּן אִלֵין מַטוּל בְּנֵי קְהָת בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: Aharon and his sons shall complete the covering of the Sanctuary and all of the holy utensils whenever the camp is about to travel, and after that, the sons of Kehos shall come to carry [these items], and they shall not touch the Holy [objects] and they will [not] die. These are what the sons of Kehos must carry for the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וְדִי מְסִיר לְאֶלְעָזָר בַּר אַהֲרֹן כַּהֲנָא מִשְׁחָא דְאַנְהָרוּתָא וּקְטוֹרֶת בּוּסְמַיָא וּמִנְחָתָּא תְדִירָא וּמִשְׁחָא דִרְבוּתָא מַטְרַת כָּל מַשְׁכְּנָא וְכָל דִי בֵהּ בְּקוּדְשָׁא וּבְמָנוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: Encharged [given] to Elazar, the son of Aharon the kohein, is the oil for illumination, the incense of spices the continual [daily] meal-offering and the anointing oil; the charge of the entire Mishkon and all of its contents in the Sanctuary, and its utensils.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה וְעִם אַהֲרֹן לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe and to Aharon, saying:

verses.ar_he: לָא תְשֵׁיצוּן יָת שִׁבְטָא זַרְעֲיַת קְהָת מִגוֹ לֵוָאֵי
verses.ar_en: Do not cut off the tribe of the families of the Kehosites, from among the Levites.

verses.ar_he: וְדָא עִבִידוּ לְהוֹן וְיֵחוּן וְלָא יְמוּתוּן בְּמִקְרַבְהוֹן לְקֹדֶשׁ קוּדְשַּׁיָא אַהֲרֹן וּבְנוֹהִי יַעֲלוּן וִימַנוּן יָתְהוֹן גְבַר גְבַר עַל פֻּלְחָנֵהּ וּלְמַטוּלֵהּ
verses.ar_en: This is what you must do for them, that they may live and not die when they approach the Holy of Holies; Aharon and his sons shall [first] come and appoint them each man individually, to [perform] his own service, and to carry his own load.

verses.ar_he: וְלָא יֵעֲלוּן לְמֶחֱזֵי כַּד מְכַסָן יָת מָנֵי קוּדְשָׁא וְלָא יְמוּתוּן
verses.ar_en: They shall not come in to see when the holy is [utensils are] being covered and [they will not] die.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: קַבֵּל יָת חֻשְׁבַּן בְּנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹן אַף אִנוּן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Take the count of the sons of Gershon as well, according to the house of their fathers according to their families.

verses.ar_he: מִבַּר תְּלָתִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא עַד בַּר חַמְשִׁין שְׁנִין תִּמְנֵי יַתְהוֹן כָּל דְאָתֵי לְחַיָלָא חֵילָא לְמִפְלַח פּוּלְחָנָא בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: From thirty years and above, until fifty years, you shall count them; all those who enter the division to serve in the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: דֵין פּוּלְחַן זַרְעֲיַת גֵרְשׁוֹן לְמִפְלַח וּלְמַטוּל
verses.ar_en: This is the service of the families of the Gershonites to serve, and to carry.

verses.ar_he: וְיִטְלוּן יָת יְרִיעַת מַשְׁכְּנָא וְיָת מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא חוֹפָאֵהּ וְחוֹפָאָה דְסַסְגוֹנָא דִי עֲלוֹהִי מִלְעֵלָא וְיָת פְּרָסָא דִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: They shall carry the tapestries of the Mishkon and [of] the Tent of Meeting, its covering and the covering of tachash which is on top of it, and the screen for the entrance to the Tent of Meeting,

verses.ar_he: וְיָת סְרָדֵי דְדַרְתָּא וְיָת פְּרָסָא דְמַעֲלָנָא דִתְרַע דַרְתָּא דִי עַל מַשְׁכְּנָא וְעַל מַדְבְּחָא סְחוֹר סְחוֹר וְיָת אַטוּנֵיהוֹן וְיָת כָּל מָנֵי פּוּלְּחַנְהוֹן וְיַת כָּל דִי יִתְמְסַר לְהוֹן וְיִפְלְחוּן
verses.ar_en: the hanging [tapestries] of the courtyard, the screen for the entrance to the gate of the courtyard which are over the Mishkon and altar on all sides, their ropes and all of their service utensils and all that will be given [delivered] to them, and thus shall they serve.

verses.ar_he: עַל מֵימַר אַהֲרֹן וּבְנוֹהִי יְהֵי כָּל פּוּלְחַן בְּנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹן לְכָל מַטוּלְהוֹן וּלְכֹל פּוּלְחַנְהוֹן וּתְמַנוּן עֲלֵיהוֹן בְּמַטָרָא יָת כָּל מַטוּלְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: By instruction of Aharon and [one of] his sons shall be all the services of the sons of the Gershonites for all that they carry and for all their service. You shall fix specified appointments for them for everything they carry.

verses.ar_he: דֵין פּוּלְחַן זַרְעֲיַת בְּנֵי גֵרְשּׁוֹן בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא וּמַטַרְתְּהוֹן בִּידָא דְאִיתָמָר בַּר אַהֲרֹן כַּהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: This is the service of the families of the sons of the Gershonites in the Tent of Meeting. Their guardianship is in the hands of Isamar, the son of Aharon the kohein.

verses.ar_he: בְּנֵי מְרָרִי לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָּהַתְהוֹן תִּמְנֵי יַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The sons of Merori, according to their families and according to the house of their fathers you shall count them.

verses.ar_he: מִבַּר תְּלָתִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא וְעַד בַּר חַמְשִׁין שְׁנִין תִּמְנִנוּן כָּל דְאָתֵי לְחֵילָא לְמִפְלָח יָת פּוּלְחַן מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: From thirty years and above until fifty years, you shall count them; all who enter the division to serve in the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וְדָא מַטְרַת מַטוּלְהוֹן לְכָל פּוּלְחַנְהוֹן בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא דַפֵּי מַשְׁכְּנָא וְעַבְרוֹהִי וְעַמוּדוֹהִי וְסַמְכוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: This is what they are entrusted to carry according to all their duties in the Tent of Meeting; the beams of the Mishkon, its bars, pillars and sockets.

verses.ar_he: וְעֲמוּדֵי דְדַרְתָּא סְחוֹר סְחוֹר וְסַמְכֵיהוֹן וְסִכֵּיהוֹן וְאַטוּנֵיהוֹן לְכָל מָנֵיהוֹן וּלְכֹל פּוּלְחַנְהוֹן וּבִשְׁמָהָן תְּמַנוּן יָת מָנֵי מַטְרַת מַטוּלְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The pillars around the courtyard, their sockets, stakes and ropes; with all their utensils and for all their service; and by name shall you appoint the utensils to the charge of those who will carry them.

verses.ar_he: דֵין פּוּלְחַן זַרְעֲיַת בְּנֵי מְרָרִי לְכָל פּוּלְחַנְהוֹן בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא בִּידָא דְאִיתָמָר בַּר אַהֲרֹן כַּהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: This is the service of the families of the sons of Merori for all their service in the Tent of Meeting, under the direction of Isamar, the son of Aharon, the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וּמְנָא משֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן וְרַבְרְבֵי כְנִשְׁתָּא יָת בְּנֵי קְהָת לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן וּלְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: They counted—Moshe, Aharon and the leaders of the congregation—the sons of the Kehosites according to their families and according to the house of their fathers.

verses.ar_he: מִבַּר תְּלָתִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא וְעַד בַּר חַמְשִׁין שְׁנִין כָּל דְאָתֵי לְחֵילָא לְפוּלְחָנָא בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: Those, from thirty years and above, until fifty years; all those who enter the division to serve in the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲווֹ מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן תְּרֵין אַלְפִין שְׁבַע מְאָה וְחַמְשִׁין
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, according to their families were two thousand seven hundred and fifty.

verses.ar_he: אִלֵין מִנְיָנֵי זַרְעֲיַת קְהָת כָּל דְפָלַח בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָּא דִי מְנָא משֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן עַל מֵימְרָא דַיְיָ בִּידָא דְמשֶׁה
verses.ar_en: These are the numbers of the families of the Kehosites of all who serve in the Tent of Meeting whom Moshe and Aharon counted according to the word of Adonoy, through Moshe.

verses.ar_he: וּמִנְיָנֵי בְּנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן וּלְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The numbers of the sons of Gershon, according to their families and according to the house of their fathers.

verses.ar_he: מִבַּר תְּלָתִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא וְעַד בַּר חַמְשִׁין שְׁנִין כָּל דְאָתֵי לְחֵילָא לְפוּלְחָנָא בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: Those, from thirty years and above, until fifty years; all who enter the division to serve in the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲווֹ מִנְיָנֵהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן תְּרֵין אַלְפִין וְשִׁית מְאָה וּתְלָתִין
verses.ar_en: Their numbers, according to their families, according to the house of their fathers were two thousand six hundred and thirty.

verses.ar_he: אִלֵין מִנְיָנֵי זַרְעֲיַת בְּנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹן כָּל דְפָלַח בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא דִי מְנָא משֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן עַל מֵימְרָא דַיְיָ
verses.ar_en: These are the numbers of the families of the sons of the Gershonites, of all those who serve in the Tent of Meeting, whom Moshe and Aharon counted, according to the word of Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וּמִנְיָנֵי זַרְעֲיַת בְּנֵי מְרָרִי לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן לְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The numbers of the families of the sons of the Merorites according to their families, according to the house of their fathers.

verses.ar_he: מִבַּר תְּלָתִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא וְעַד בַּר חַמְשִׁין שְׁנִין כָּל דְאָתֵי לְחֵילָא לְפוּלְחָנָא בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: Those, from thirty years and above, until fifty years; all who enter the division to serve in the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲווֹ מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן תְּלָתָא אַלְפִין וּמָאתָן
verses.ar_en: Their numbers were, according to their families, three thousand two hundred.

verses.ar_he: אִלֵין מִנְיָנֵי זַרְעֲיַת בְּנֵי מְרָרִי דִי מְנָא משֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן עַל מֵימְרָא דַיְיָ בִּידָא דְמשֶׁה
verses.ar_en: These are the numbers of the families of the sons of the Merorites whom Moshe and Aharon counted according to the word of Adonoy, through Moshe.

verses.ar_he: כָּל מִנְיָנַיָא דִי מְנָא משֶׁה וְאַהֲרֹן וְרַבְרְבֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל יָת לֵוָאֵי לְזַרְעֲיַתְהוֹן וּלְבֵית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: The total of the numbers counted by Moshe, Aharon and the leaders of the congregation [of] the Levites according to their families, according to the house of their fathers.

verses.ar_he: מִבַּר תְּלָתִין שְׁנִין וּלְעֵלָא וְעַד בַּר חַמְשִׁין שְׁנִין כָּל דְאָתֵי לְמִפְלַח פּוּלְחַן פּוּלְחָנָא וּפוּלְחַן מַטוּל בְּמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: Those from thirty years and above, until fifty years; all who enter to serve the service of service and the service of carrying in the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲווֹ מִנְיָנֵיהוֹן תְּמַנְיָא אַלְפִין וַחֲמֵשׁ מְאָה וְתַמְנָן
verses.ar_en: Their numbers were eight thousand five hundred and eighty.

verses.ar_he: עַל מֵימְרָא דַיְיָ מְנָא יָתְהוֹן בִּידָא דְמשֶׁה גְבַר גְבַר עַל פּוּלְחָנֵהּ וְעַל מַטוּלֵהּ וּמִנְיָנוֹהִי דִי פַקִיד יְיָ יָת משֶׁה
verses.ar_en: According to the word of Adonoy he counted them, by the hand of Moshe, each man according to his service and according to what he carries; and they were counted, as Adonoy commanded Moshe.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: פַּקֵיד יָת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וִישַׁלְחוּן מִן מַשְׁרִיתָא כָּל דִסְגִיר וְכָל דְדָאֵב וְכֹל דִמְסָאָב לִטְמֵי נַפְשָׁא דֶאֱנָשָׁא
verses.ar_en: Command Bnei Yisroel that they must expel from the camp. anyone with tzora’as, and anyone from whom flows a [seminal] discharge and anyone who became defiled by a (departed) [the bones of the] soul [of a person].

verses.ar_he: מִדְכַר עַד נוּקְבָא תְּשַׁלְחוּן לְמִבָּרָא לְמַשְׁרִיתָא תְּשַׁלְחֻנוּן וְלָא יְסַאֲבוּן יָת מַשְׁרִיתְהוֹן דִי שְׁכִינְתִּי שַׁרְיָא בֵינֵיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Whether male or female you shall send them out. Beyond the camp you shall send them, and they shall not defile their camps in which I dwell [My Shechina dwells] among them.

verses.ar_he: וַעֲבָדוּ כֵן בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְשַׁלְחוּ יָתְהוֹן לְמִבָּרָא לְמַשְׁרִיתָא כְּמָא דִי מַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה כֵּן עֲבָדוּ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל
verses.ar_en: Bnei Yisroel did so, and they sent them beyond the camp; just as Adonoy spoke to Moshe, so did Bnei Yisroel do.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: מַלֵל עִם בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל גְבַר אוֹ אִתְּתָא אֲרֵי יַעְבְּדוּן מִכָּל חוֹבֵי אֱנָשָׁא לְשַׁקָרָא שְׁקָר קֳדָם יְיָ וְיֵחוֹב אֱנָשָׁא הַהוּא
verses.ar_en: Speak to Bnei Yisroel: When a man or a woman commits any of the sins against man, acting treacherously [untruthfully before] against Adonoy, and that person is guilty.

verses.ar_he: וִיוַדוּן יָת חוֹבֵיהוֹן דִי עֲבָדוּ וְיָתֵב יָת חוֹבְתֵהּ בְּרֵישֵׁהּ וְחֻמְשֵׁהּ יוֹסֵף עֲלוֹהִי וְיִתֵּן לִדְחָב לֵהּ
verses.ar_en: They shall confess the sins which they committed and return the principal amount [of the object] of his guilt, and add one fifth to that amount. He shall then give it to whom he is indebted.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם לֵית לִגְבַר פָּרִיק לַאֲתָבָא חוֹבְתָא לֵהּ חוֹבְתָא דִמְתֵב קֳדָם יְיָ לְכַהֲנָא בַּר מִדְכַר כִּפּוּרַיָא דִי יְכַפֵּר בֵּהּ עֲלוֹהִי
verses.ar_en: But if the man has no redeemer (relative) to whom the debt may be returned, the debt being returned then belongs to Adonoy, [then] to the kohein. This is besides the ram of forgiveness with which he [his sin] will be atoned.

verses.ar_he: וְכָל אַפְרָשׁוּתָא לְכָל קוּדְשַׁיָא דִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל דִי יְקָרְבוּן לְכַהֲנָא דִלֵהּ יְהֵא
verses.ar_en: Every terumah-gift of all the sacred things of Bnei Yisroel that they will bring to the kohein, shall be his.

verses.ar_he: וּגְבַר יָת מַעֲשַׂר קוּדְשֵׁהּ דִלֵהּ יְהוֹן גְבַר דְיִתֵּן לְכַהֲנָא דִלֵהּ יְהֵא
verses.ar_en: A [tenth of] man’s sacred objects shall be his; whatever a man gives to the kohein, shall be his.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: מַלֵל עִם בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְתֵימַר לְהוֹן גְבַר גְבַר אֲרֵי תִסְטֵי אִתְּתֵהּ וּתְשַׁקֵר בֵּהּ שְׁקָר
verses.ar_en: Speak to Bnei Yisroel and say to them: If any man’s wife goes astray and acts treacherously [untruthfully] toward him.

verses.ar_he: וְיִשְׁכֻּב גְבַר יָתַהּ שָׁכְבַת זַרְעָא וִיהֵי מְכַסָא מֵעֵינֵי בַעְלַהּ וּמִטַמְרָא וְהִיא מְסָאֲבָא וְסָהִיד לֵית בַּהּ וְהִיא לָא אִתַּחָדַת
verses.ar_en: And a man has lain with her conjugally but it was hidden [covered] from her husband’s eyes and she was concealed and has become defiled and there is no witness against her, and she was not seized forcibly.

verses.ar_he: וְיֶעְבַּר עֲלוֹהִי רוּחַ קִנְאָה וִיקַנֵי יָת אִתְּתֵהּ וְהִיא מְסָאֲבָא אוֹ עֲבַר עֲלוֹהִי רוּחַ קִנְאָה וִיקַנֵי יָת אִתְּתֵהּ וְהִיא לָא מְסָאֲבָא
verses.ar_en: [When] a spirit of jealousy comes upon him and he is jealous of his wife and she was defiled or, a spirit of jealousy comes upon him and he is jealous of his wife and she was not defiled,

verses.ar_he: וְיַיְתֵי גַבְרָא יָת אִתְּתֵהּ לְוַת כַּהֲנָא וְיַיְתֵי יָת קֻרְבָּנַהּ עֲלַהּ חַד מִן עַסְרָא בִּתְלַת סְאִין קִמְחָא שְׂעָרִין לָא יְרִיק עֲלוֹהִי מִשְׁחָא וְלָא יִתֵּן עֲלוֹהִי לְבֻנְתָּא אֲרֵי מִנְחַת קִנְאָתָא הוּא מִנְחַת דוּכְרָנָא מַדְכָּרַת חוֹבָא
verses.ar_en: that man shall bring his wife to the kohein and he shall bring her offering for her; [which is] one tenth of an epha [three se’in] of barley flour; he shall not pour oil over it and he shall not put frankincense on it, for it is a meal-offering of jealousy, a meal-offering of remembrance, recalling an iniquity.

verses.ar_he: וִיקָרֵב יָתַהּ כַּהֲנָא וִיקִימִנַהּ קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall bring her near and station her before Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב כַּהֲנָא מֵי כִיוֹר בְּמַן דַחֲסָף וּמִן עַפְרָא דִי יְהֵי בִּיסוֹדֵי מַשְׁכְּנָא יִסַב כַּהֲנָא וְיִתֵּן לְמַיָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall take sanctified waters [water from the copper wash basin] in a clay utensil, and of the earth that will be on the floor [base] of the Mishkon, the kohein shall take and put into the water.

verses.ar_he: וִיקֵים כַּהֲנָא יָת אִתְּתָא קֳדָם יְיָ וְיִפְרַע יָת רֵישָׁא דְאִתְּתָא וְיתֵּן עַל יְדָהָא יָת מִנְחַת דוּכְרָנָא מִנְחַת קִנְאָתָא הִיא וּבִידָא דְכַהֲנָא יְהוֹן מַיָא מְרִירַיָא מְלַטְטַיָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall station the woman before Adonoy, and expose the woman’s hair, and place on her palms [hands] the meal-offering of remembrance; it is a meal-offering of jealousy and there will be in the kohein’s hand, the bitter, lethal waters.

verses.ar_he: וְיוֹמֵי יָתַהּ כַּהֲנָא וְיֵימַר לְאִתְּתָא אִם לָא שְׁכִיב גְבַר יָתִיךְ וְאִם לָא סְטִּית לְאִסְתְּאָבָא בַּר מִבַּעֲלִיךְ הֱוֵי זַכָּאָה מִמַיָא מְרִירַיָא מְלַטְטַיָא הָאִלֵין
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall place her under oath and say to the woman: If a man has not lain with you [conjugally] and if you have not gone astray to be defiled while you were married to [by someone other than] your husband, you shall be absolved of these bitter, lethal waters.

verses.ar_he: וְאַתְּ אֲרֵי סְטִית בַּר מִבַּעֲלִיךְ וַאֲרֵי אִסְתָּאָבְתְּ וִיהַב גְבַר בִּיךְ יָת שְׁכֻבְתֵּהּ בַּר מִבַּעֲלִיךְ
verses.ar_en: [But] you, if you have gone astray while you were married to your husband, and if you have been defiled, and if a man has lain conjugally with you, [a man] other than your husband.

verses.ar_he: וְיוֹמֵי כַהֲנָא יָת אִתְּתָא בְּמוֹמָתָא דִלְוָטָּא וְיֵימַר כַּהֲנָא לְאִתְּתָא יִתֵּן יְיָ יָתִיךְ לִלְוַטּ וּלְמוֹמֵי בְּגוֹ עַמִיךְ בִּדְיִתֵּן יְיָ יָת יַרְכִּיךְ מַסְיָא וְיָת מְעַיְכִי נְפִיחִין
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall place the woman under oath with the oath of accursedness, and the kohein shall say to the woman: “Adonoy shall make you a curse and an oath among your people, when Adonoy causes your thigh to collapse [fall away] and your abdomen to swell.

verses.ar_he: וְיֵעֲלוּן מַיָא מְלַטְטַיָא הָאִלֵין בִּמְעַיְכִי לַאֲפָחָא מְעִין וּלְאַמְסָאָה יַרְכָּא וְתֵימַר אִתְּתָא אָמֵן אָמֵן
verses.ar_en: This bitter, lethal water will enter your abdomen to swell [inflate] the abdomen, and collapse [fall away] the thigh and the woman shall say “Amein, Amein”.

verses.ar_he: וְיִכְתּוֹב יָת לְוָטַיָא הָאִלֵין כַּהֲנָא בְּסִפְרָא וְיִמְחוֹק לְמַיָא מְרִירַיָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall write all these curses, on the scroll and dissolve them (the writing) in the bitter waters.

verses.ar_he: וְיַשְׁקֵי יָת אִתְּתָא יָת מַיָא מְרִירַיָא מְלַטְטַיָא וְיֵעֲלוּן בַּהּ מַיָא מְלַטְטַיָא לִמְרִירוּ
verses.ar_en: He shall have the woman drink the bitter, lethal waters and the lethal waters, shall enter her to become bitter.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב כַּהֲנָא מִידָא דְאִתְּתָא יָת מִנְחַת קִנְאָתָא וִירֵים יָת מִנְחָתָא קָדָם יְיָ וִיקָרֵב יָתַהּ לְמַדְבְּחָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall take from the woman’s hand the meal-offering of jealousy and he shall wave the meal-offering before Adonoy, and bring it close to the Altar.

verses.ar_he: וְיִקְמוֹץ כַּהֲנָא מִן מִנְחָתָא יָת אַדְכַּרְתָּהּ וְיַסֵק לְמַדְבְּחָא וּבָתַר כֵּן יַשְׁקֵי יָת אִתְּתָא יָת מַיָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall scoop out from the meal-offering its commemoration and burn it on [bring it up to] the Altar, and after that he shall cause the woman to drink the water.

verses.ar_he: וְיַשְׁקִנָהּ יָת מַיָא וּתְהֵי אִם אִסְתָּאָבַת וְשַׁקָרַת שְׁקָר בְּבַעֲלַהּ וְיֵעֲלוּן בַּה מַיָא מְלַטְטַיָא לִמְרִירוּ וְיִפְּחוּן מְעָהָא וְתִתְמְסֵי יַרְכַהּ וּתְהֵי אִתְּתָא לִלְוַט בְּגוֹ עַמָהּ
verses.ar_en: He shall make her drink the water, and it shall be that if she had been defiled and had deceived [been untruthful to] her husband, the lethal waters shall enter her to become bitter, and her abdomen will swell and her thigh will collapse [fall away], and the woman will be a curse among her people.

verses.ar_he: וְאִם לָא אִסתָּאָבַת אִתְּתָא וְדַכְוָאָה הִיא וְתִפּוֹק זַכָּאָה וְתַעְדִי עִדוּי
verses.ar_en: But if the woman was not defiled and [she] is pure, she will be cleansed [go out exonerated] and shall bear seed [will conceive].

verses.ar_he: דָא אוֹרַיְתָא דְקִנְאָתָא דִי תִסְטֵי אִתְּתָא בַּר מִבַּעֲלַהּ וְתִסְתָּאָב
verses.ar_en: This is the law of jealousies, when a woman goes astray during her marriage to her husband and is defiled.

verses.ar_he: אוֹ גְבַר דִי תֶעְבַּר עֲלוֹהִי רוּחַ קִנְאָה וִיקַנֵי יָת אִתְּתֵהּ וִיקֵם יָת אִתְּתָא קֳדָם יְיָ וְיַעֲבֵד לַהּ כַּהֲנָא יָת כָּל אוֹרַיְתָא הָדָא
verses.ar_en: If a man is overcome with a spirit of jealousy and he is jealous of his wife, then he shall have the woman stand before Adonoy, and the kohein shall do unto her all of these laws.

verses.ar_he: וִיהֵי זַכָּאָה גַבְרָא מֵחוֹבָא וְאִתְּתָא הַהִיא תְּקַבֵּל יָת חוֹבָהּ
verses.ar_en: The man is cleansed [innocent] of sin and that woman shall bear [the burden of] her iniquity.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: מַלֵל עִם בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וְתֵימַר לְהוֹן גְבַר אוֹ אִתְּתָא אֲרֵי יְפָרֵשׁ לְמִדַר נְדַר נְזִירוּ לְמֵיזַר קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: Speak to Bnei Yisroel and say to them: If a man or a woman sets apart a vow, a nazirite vow, to set [himself] apart for [from before] Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: מֵחֲמַר חֲדַת וְעַתִּיק יַנְזִיר חַל דַחֲמַר חֲדַת וְחַל דַחֲמַר עַתִּיק לָא יִשְׁתֵּי וְכָל מַתְרוּת עִנְבִין לָא יִשְׁתֵּי וְעִנְבִין רַטִיבִין וִיבֵשִׁין לָא יֵיכוּל
verses.ar_en: From new or old [intoxicating] wine, he must abstain. Vinegar made from new wine and vinegar made from old wine he shall not drink; anything steeped in grapes he shall not drink; moist grapes or dried grapes (raisins) he shall not eat.

verses.ar_he: כֹּל יוֹמֵי נִזְרֵהּ מִכֹּל דְיִתְעֲבֵד מִגֻפְנָא דְחַמְרָא מִפּוּרְצְנִין וְעַד עִצוּרִין לָא יֵיכוּל
verses.ar_en: As long as he is a Nazir from anything made of the grape-vine, from seeds to skin, he shall not eat.

verses.ar_he: כָּל יוֹמֵי נְדַר נִזְרֵהּ מַסְפַּר לָא יֶעְבַּר עַל רֵישֵׁהּ עַד מִשְׁלַם יוֹמַיָא דְיַנְזֵר קֳדָם יְיָ קַדִישׁ יְהֵי מַרְבֵּי פֵרוּעַ שְׂעַר רֵישֵׁהּ
verses.ar_en: As long as [all the days] he is under his nazirite oath a razor shall not pass over [to touch] his head. Until he completes his days as a Nazir to Adonoy he shall be sacred, he shall let the hair of his head grow long.

verses.ar_he: כָּל יוֹמִין דְיַנְזֵר קֳדָם יְיָ עַל נַפְשָׁא דְמֵתָא לָא יֵיעוּלּ
verses.ar_en: All the days that he is a Nazir to Adonoy, he shall have no contact with the dead.

verses.ar_he: לְאָבוּהִי וּלְאִמֵהּ לְאַחוֹהִי וּלְאַחָתֵהּ לָא יִסְתָּאַב לְהוֹן בְּמוֹתְהּוֹן אֲרֵי כְּלִילָא דֶאֱלָהֵהּ עַל רֵישֵׁהּ
verses.ar_en: For his father, mother, brother and sister he shall not [ritually] defile himself for them when they die. For, the nazirite crown of his God is upon his head.

verses.ar_he: כֹּל יוֹמֵי נִזְרֵהּ קַדִישׁ הוּא קֳדָם יְיָ
verses.ar_en: All the days of his separation, he is sacred to Adonoy.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲרֵי יְמוּת מֵתָא עֲלוֹהִי בִּתְכֵּף שָׁלוּ וִיסָאֵב רֵישׁ נִזְרֵהּ וִיגַלַח רֵישֵׁהּ בְּיוֹמָא דִדְכוּתֵהּ בְּיוֹמָא שְׁבִיעָאָה יְגַלְחִנֵהּ
verses.ar_en: If someone died near him suddenly, or unexpectedly, and caused his nazirite crowned head to be defiled, he shall shave his head on the day of his purification, he shall shave it on the seventh day.

verses.ar_he: וּבְיוֹמָא תְמִינָאָה יַיְתֵי תַּרְתֵּין שַׁפְנִינִין אוֹ תְרֵין בְּנֵי יוֹנָה לְוָת כַּהֲנָא לִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: On the eighth day he shall take two turtledoves or two young pigeons to the kohein, to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וְיַעְבֵּד כַּהֲנָא חַד לְחַטָאתָא וְחַד לַעֲלָתָא וִיכַפֵּר עֲלוֹהִי מִדְחָב עַל מִתָא וִיקַדַשׁ יָת רֵישֵׁהּ בְּיוֹמָא הַּהוּא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall prepare one for a sin-offering and one for a burnt-offering and atone on his behalf from his sin [of contact] with a [departed] soul, and he shall sanctify his head on that day.

verses.ar_he: וְיַזֵר קֳדָם יְיָ יָת יוֹמֵי נִזְרֵהּ וְיַיְתִי אִמַר בַּר שַׁתֵּהּ לַאֲשָׁמָא וְיוֹמַיָא קַדְמָאֵי יִבְטְלוּן אֲרֵי אִסְתָּאַב נִזְרֵהּ
verses.ar_en: He shall set apart, for Adonoy, his nazirite days, and bring a sheep in its first year as a guilt-offering. The first days shall elapse because his nazirite crown was defiled.

verses.ar_he: וְדָא אוֹרַיְתָא דִנְזִירָא בְּיוֹם מִשְׁלַם יוֹמֵי נִזְרֵהּ יַיְתִי יָתֵהּ לִתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא
verses.ar_en: This is the law of the Nazir: when the days of his nazirite status are fulfilled, he shall bring himself to the entrance of the Tent of Meeting.

verses.ar_he: וִיקָרֵב יָת קֻרְבָּנֵהּ קֳדָם יְיָ אִמַר בַּר שַׁתֵּהּ שְׁלִים חַד לַעֲלָתָא וְאִמַרְתָּא חֲדָא בַּת שַׁתָּהּ שְׁלֶמְתָּא לְחַטָאתָא וּדְכַר חַד שְׁלִים לְנִכְסַת קוּדְשַׁיָא
verses.ar_en: He shall bring his offering to Adonoy; one unblemished sheep, in its first year, as a burnt-offering, and one unblemished ewe, in its first year as a sin-offering, and one unblemished ram as a peace-offering [sacred sacrifice].

verses.ar_he: וְסַלָא דְפַּטִרִיָא סֻלְּתָּא גְרִיצַן דְפִילָן בִּמְשַׁח וְאִסְפּוֹגִין פַּטִירִין דִמְשִׁיחִין בִּמְשָׁח וּמִנְחַתְהוֹן וְנִסְכֵּיהוֹן
verses.ar_en: A basket of matzos of fine flour, loaves mixed with oil and matzoh-wafers spread with oil and their meal-offerings and libations.

verses.ar_he: וִיקָרֵב כַּהֲנָא קֳדָם יְיָ וְיַעְבֵּד יָת חַטָאתֵהּ וְיָת עֲלָתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall bring it before Adonoy and do the service of his sin-offering and of his burnt-offering.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת דִכְרָא יַעְבֵּד נִכְסַת קוּדְשַׁיָא קֳדָם יְיָ עַל סַלָא דְפַטִּירַיָא וְיַעְבֵּד כַּהֲנָא יָת מִנְחָתֵהּ וְיָת נִסְכֵּהּ
verses.ar_en: He shall make the ram a peace-offering [sacred sacrifice] for Adonoy along with the basket of matzos, and the kohein shall do the service of his meal-offering and libation.

verses.ar_he: וִיגַלַח נְזִירָא בִּתְרַע מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא יָת רֵישׁ נִזְרֵהּ וְיִסַב יָת שְׂעַר רֵישׁ נִזְרֵהּ וְיִתֵּן עַל אֶשָׁתָא דִי תְחוֹת דוּדָא דְנִכְסַת קוּדְשַׁיָא
verses.ar_en: The Nazir shall shave—at the entrance to the Tent of Meeting—the nazirite crown of hair on his head, and he shall take the hair from the nazirite crown on his head and put it in the fire which is under the [cauldron of the] peace-offering [sacred] sacrifice.

verses.ar_he: וְיִסַב כַּהֲנָא יָת דְרָעָא בְּשֵׁלָא מִן דִכְרָא וּגְרִצְתָּא פַטִּירְתָּא חֲדָא מִן סַלָא וְאִסְפּוֹג פַּטִיר חָד וְיִתֵּן עַל יְדֵי נְזִירָא בָּתַר דְגַלַח יָת נִזְרֵהּ
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall take the cooked foreleg from the ram and one matzoh-loaf from the basket, and one matzoh-wafer, and put it on the palms [hands] of the Nazir after he has shaved his nazirite crown.

verses.ar_he: וִירִים יָתְהוֹן כַּהֲנָא אֲרָמָא קֳדָם יְיָ קוּדְשָׁא הוּא לְכַהֲנָא עַל חַדְיָא דַאֲרָמוּתָא וְעַל שַׁקָא דְאַפְרָשׁוּתָא וּבָתַר כֵּן יִשְׁתֵּי נְזִירָא חַמְרָא
verses.ar_en: The kohein shall wave them as a wave-offering, before Adonoy. It is consecrated to the kohein besides the breast of the wave-offering and the separated thigh portion. After this, the Nazir may drink wine.

verses.ar_he: דָא אוֹרַיְתָא דִנְזִירָא דִי יִדַר קֻרְבָּנֵהּ קֳדָם יְיָ עַל נִזְרֵהּ בַּר מִדְתַדְבֵּק יְדֵהּ כְּפוּם נִדְרֵהּ דִי יִדַר כֵּן יַעְבֵּד עַל אוֹרַיְתָא דְנִזְרֵהּ
verses.ar_en: This is the law of the Nazir who has vowed—[this is] his offering to Adonoy for his nazirite vow, aside from what he can afford [lit. may attach to his hands] to bring according to his vow that he vows. So shall he fulfill in addition to the laws of his nazirite [vows.]

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: מַלֵל עִם אַהֲרֹן וְעִם בְּנוֹהִי לְמֵימַר כְּדֵין תְּבָרְכוּן יָת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל תֵּימְרוּן לְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Speak to Aharon and to his sons, saying; This is how you shall bless Bnei Yisroel, saying to them:

verses.ar_he: יְבָרְכִינָךְ יְיָ וְיִטְרִינָךְ
verses.ar_en: May Adonoy bless you and protect you.

verses.ar_he: יַנְהַר יְיָ שְׁכִנְתֵּהּ לְוָתָךְ וִירַחֵם יָתָךְ
verses.ar_en: May Adonoy cause His countenance [Shechinah] to shine upon you and favor you.

verses.ar_he: יִסַב יְיָ אַפֵּהּ לְוָתָךְ וִישַׁוֵי לָךְ שְׁלָם
verses.ar_en: May Adonoy lift His face to you, and grant you peace.

verses.ar_he: וִישַׁווּן יָת בִּרְכַּת שְׁמִי עַל בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל וַאֲנָא אֲבָרֵכִנוּן
verses.ar_en: They shall bestow [the blessing of] My Name upon Bnei Yisroel, and I will bless them.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲוָה בְּיוֹמָא דְשֵׁיצֵי משֶׁה לַאֲקָמָא יָת מַשְׁכְּנָא וְרַבִּי יָתֵהּ וְקַדִישׁ יָתֵהּ וְיָת כָּל מָנוֹהִי וְיָת מַדְבְּחָא וְיָת כָּל מָנוֹהִי וְרַבִּנוּן וְקַדֵישׁ יָתְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: It came to pass, on the day Moshe finished erecting the Mishkon, and he anointed it and consecrated it and all of its utensils, and the Altar and all its utensils, and he anointed them and consecrated them.

verses.ar_he: וּקְרִיבוּ רַבְרְבֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל רֵישֵׁי בֵּית אֲבָהַתְהוֹן אִנוּן רַבְרְבֵי שִׁבְטַיָא אִנוּן דְקַיְמִין עַל מִנְיָנַיָא
verses.ar_en: The leaders of Israel brought, [those who were] the heads of their fathers’ houses; they were the leaders of the tribes, they stood by during the counting.

verses.ar_he: וְאַיְתִיוּ יָת קֻרְבָּנֵיהוֹן קֳדָם יְיָ שִׁית עֶגְלָן כַּד מְחַפְיָן וּתְרֵי עֲשַׂר תּוֹרִין עֶגְלְתָא עַל תְּרֵין רַבְרְבַיָא וְתוֹר לְחַד וְקָרִיבוּ יָתְהוֹן לָקֳדָם מַשְׁכְּנָא
verses.ar_en: They brought their offerings before Adonoy; six covered wagons and twelve oxen; a wagon for each two leaders and an ox for each individual, and they placed them before the Mishkon.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר יְיָ לְמשֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: Adonoy said to Moshe, saying:

verses.ar_he: קַבֵּל מִנְהוֹן וִיהוֹן לְמִפְלַח יָת פּוּלְחַן מַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא וְתִתֵּן יָתְהוֹן לְלֵוָאֵי גְבַר כְּמִסַת פּוּלְחָנֵהּ
verses.ar_en: Take [the offering] from them, and let them be used for the service of the Tent of Meeting. Give them to the Levites, each man according to [the needs] his work.

verses.ar_he: וּנְסֵיב משֶׁה יָת עֶגְלָתָא וְיָת תּוֹרִין וִיהַב יָתְהוֹן לְלֵוָאֵי
verses.ar_en: Moshe took the wagons and the oxen and gave them to the Levites.

verses.ar_he: יָת תַּרְתֵּין עֶגְלָתָא וְיָת אַרְבַּעַת תוֹרֵי יְהַב לִבְנֵי גֵרְשׁוֹן כְּמִסַת פּוּלְחַנְהוֹן
verses.ar_en: Two [of the] wagons and four [of the] oxen he gave to the sons of Gershon, according to [the needs] their work.

verses.ar_he: וְיָת אַרְבַּע עֶגְלָתָא וְיָת תְּמַנְיָא תוֹרֵי יְהַב לִבְנֵי מְרָרִי כְּמִסַת פּוּלְחַנְהוֹן בִּידָא דְאִיתָמָר בַּר אַהֲרֹן כַּהֲנָא
verses.ar_en: Four [of the] wagons and eight [of the] oxen he gave to the sons of Merori. According to their work they were in the charge of Isamar the son of Aharon the kohein.

verses.ar_he: וְלִבְנֵי קְהָת לָא יְהָב אֲרֵי פוּלְחַן קוּדְשָׁא עֲלֵיהוֹן בְּכַתְפָּא נָטְלִין
verses.ar_en: He did not give any to the sons of Kehos because the sacred work was [incumbent] upon them, which they had to carry on their shoulders.

verses.ar_he: וְקָרִיבוּ רַבְרְבַיָא יָת חֲנֻכַּת מַדְבְּחָא בְּיוֹמָא דְרַבִּיוּ יָתֵהּ וְקָרִיבוּ רַבְרְבַיָא יָת קֻרְבַּנְהוֹן לְּקֳדָם מַדְבְּחָא
verses.ar_en: The leaders brought forward the [offerings for] the consecration of the altar on the day it was anointed. The leaders placed their offering before the altar.

verses.ar_he: וַאֲמַר יְיָ לְמשֶׁה רַבָּא חַד לְיוֹמָא רַבָּא חַד לְיוֹמָא יְקָרְבוּן יָת קֻרְבַּנְהוֹן לַחֲנֻכַּת מַדְבְּחָא
verses.ar_en: Adonoy said to Moshe: One leader each day, one leader each day, they shall bring forth their offering, for the dedication of the altar.

verses.ar_he: וַהֲוָה דִמְקָרַב בְּיוֹמָא קַדְמָאָה יָת קֻרְבָּנֵהּ נַחְשׁוֹן בַּר עַמִינָדָב לְשִׁבְטָא דִיהוּדָה
verses.ar_en: The one that brought his offering on the first day [was] Nachshon the son of Aminadav, of the tribe of Yehudah.

verses.ar_he: וְקֻרְבָּנֵהּ מְגִסְתָּא דִכְסַף חֲדָא מְאָה וּתְלָתִין סִלְעִין הֲוָה מַתְקְלַהּ מִזְרְקָא חַד דִכְסַף מַתְקְלֵהּ שַׁבְעִין סִלְעִין בְּסִלְעֵי קוּדְשָׁא תַּרְוֵיהוֹן מְלַן סֻלְתָּא דְּפִילָא בִמְשַׁח לְמִנְחָתָא
verses.ar_en: His offering was one silver tray, its weight was one hundred thirty shekolim; one silver bowl [that weighed] seventy shekolim according to sanctuary weights. Both were filled with fine flour kneaded with [olive] oil, for a meal-offering.

verses.ar_he: בָּזִיכָא חֲדָא מַתְקַל עֲשַׂר סִלְעִין הִיא דִדְהַב מַלְיָא קְטוֹרֶת בּוּסְמַיָא
verses.ar_en: One spoon of ten gold [shekolim], filled with [fragrant] incense.

verses.ar_he: תּוֹר חַד בַּר תּוֹרֵי דְּכַר חַד אִמַּר חַד בַּר שַׁתֵּהּ לַעֲלָתָא
verses.ar_en: One young bull, one ram, and one yearling sheep for a burnt-offering.

verses.ar_he: צְפִיר בַּר עִזִּין חַד לְחַטָּאתָא
verses.ar_en: [And] one he-goat, for a sin-offering.

verses.ar_he: וּלְנִכְסַת קוּדְשַׁיָּא תּוֹרִין תְּרֵין דִּכְרִין חַמְשָׁא גְּדָיֵי חַמְשָׁא אִמְּרִין בְּנֵי שַׁתָּא חַמְשָׁא דֵּין קֻרְבָּנָא דְנַחְשׁוֹן בַּר עַמִּינָדָב
verses.ar_en: For the peace [sacred]-offering, two oxen, five rams, five kids, and five yearling sheep. This was the offering of Nachshon the son of Aminadav.

verses.ar_he: בְּיוֹמָא תִּנְיָנָא קָרִיב נְתַנְאֵל בַּר צוּעָר רַבָּא דְיִשָׂשׂכָר
verses.ar_en: On the second day, [he that] brought [was] Nesanel the son of Tzu’ar, the leader of Yissachar.

verses.ar_he: קָרִיב יָת קֻרְבָּנֵהּ מְגִסְתָּא דִכְסַף חֲדָא מְאָה וּתְלָתִין סִלְעִין הֲוָה מַתְקְלֵהּ מִזְרְקָא חַד דִכְסַף מַתְקְלַהּ שַׁבְעִין סִלְעִין בְּסִלְעֵי קוּדְשָׁא תַּרְוֵיהוֹן מְלַן סֻלְתָּא דְפִילָא בִמְשַׁח לְמִנְחָתָא
verses.ar_en: He brought forward his offering, one silver tray, its weight was one hundred thirty [shekolim]; one silver bowl [that weighed] seventy shekolim according to sanctuary weights. Both were filled with fine flour kneaded with [olive] oil, for a meal-offering.

verses.ar_he: בָּזִיכָא חֲדָא מַתְקַל עֲשַׂר סִלְעִין הִיא דִדְהַב מַלְיָא קְטוֹרֶת בּוּסְמַיָא
verses.ar_en: One spoon of ten gold [shekolim] filled with incense.

verses.ar_he: תּוֹר חַד בַּר תּוֹרֵי דְכַר חַד אִמַר חַד בַּר שַׁתֵּהּ לַעֲלָתָא
verses.ar_en: One young bull, one ram, and one yearling sheep for a burnt-offering.

verses.ar_he: צְפִיר בַּר עִזִין חַד לְחַטָאתָא
verses.ar_en: [And] one he-goat for a sin-offering.

verses.ar_en: For the peace-offering sacrifice, two oxen, five rams, five kids, and five yearling sheep. This was the offering of Nesanel the son of Tzu’ar.

verses.ar_he: בְּיוֹמָא תְּלִיתָאָה רַבָּא לִבְנֵי זְבוּלֻן אֱלִיאָב בַּר חֵלֹן
verses.ar_en: On the third day, the leader of the sons of Zevulun, Eliav the son of Cheilon.

verses.ar_he: קֻרְבָּנֵהּ מְגִסְתָּא דִכְסַף חֲדָא מְאָה וּתְלָתִין סִלְעִין הֲוָה מַתְקְלַהּ מִזְרְקָא חַד דִכְסַף מַתְקְלֵהּ שַׁבְעִין סִלְעִין בְּסִלְעֵי קוּדְשָׁא תַּרְוֵיהוֹן מְלַן סֻלְתָּא דְפִילָא בִמְשַׁח לְמִנְחָתָא
verses.ar_en: His offering was one silver tray, its weight was one hundred thirty shekolim; one silver bowl [that weighed] seventy shekolim according to sanctuary weights. Both were filled with fine flour kneaded with [olive] oil, for a meal-offering.

verses.ar_he: בָּזִיכָא חֲדָא מַתְקַל עֲשַׂר סִלְעִין הִיא דִדְהַב מַלְיָא קְטוֹרֶת בּוּסְמַיָא
verses.ar_en: One spoon of ten gold [shekolim], filled with incense.

verses.ar_en: [And] one he-goat for a sin-offering.

verses.ar_he: וּלְנִכְסַת קוּדְשַׁיָא תּוֹרִין תְּרֵין דִכְרִין חַמְשָׁא גְדָיֵי חַמְשָׁא אִמְרִין בְּנֵי שַׁתָּא חַמְשָׁא דֵין קֻרְבַּן אֱלִיאָב בַּר חֵלוֹן
verses.ar_en: For the peace-offering sacrifice, two oxen, five rams, five kids and five yearling sheep. This was the offering of of Eliav the son of Cheilon.

verses.ar_he: בְּיוֹמָא רְבִיעָאָה רַבָּא לִבְנֵי רְאוּבֵן אֱלִיצוּר בַּר שְׁדֵיאוּר
verses.ar_en: On the fourth day, the leader of the sons of Reuven, Elitzur the son of Shdeiur.

verses.ar_he: קֻרְבָּנֵהּ מְגִסְתָּא דִכְסַף חֲדָא מְאָה וּתְלָתִין סִלְעִין הֲוָה מַתְקְלַהּ מִזְרְקָא חַד דִכְסַף מַתְקְלֵהּ שַׁבְעִין סִלְעִין בְּסִלְעֵי קוּדְשָׁא תַּרְוֵיהוֹן מְלַן סֻלְתָּא דְפִילָא בִמְשַׁח לְמִנְחָתָא
verses.ar_en: His offering was one silver tray, its weight was one hundred thirty shekolim; one silver bowl [that weighed] seventy shekolim according to sanctuary weights. Both were filled with fine flour kneaded with [olive] oil, for a meal-offering.

verses.ar_he: בָּזִיכָא חֲדָא מַתְקַל עֲשַׂר סִלְעִין הִיא דִדְהַב מַלְיָא קְטוֹרֶת בּוּסְמַיָא

verses.ar_he: תּוֹר חַד בַּר תּוֹרֵי דְכַר חַד אִמַר חַד בַּר שַׁתֵּהּ לַעֲלָתָא

verses.ar_he: צְפִיר בַּר עִזִין חַד לְחַטָאתָא
verses.ar_en: [And] one he-goat for a sin-offering.

verses.ar_he: וּלְנִכְסַת קוּדְשַׁיָא תּוֹרִין תְּרֵין דִכְרִין חַמְשָׁא גְדָיֵי חַמְשָׁא אִמְרִין בְּנֵי שַׁתָּא חַמְשָׁא דֵין קֻרְבַּן אֱלִיצוּר בַּר שְׁדֵיאוּר
verses.ar_en: For the peace-offering sacrifice, two oxen, five rams, five kids and five yearling sheep. This was the offering of Elitzur the son of Shdeiur.

verses.ar_he: בְּיוֹמָא תְּרֵי עֲשַׂר יוֹמָא רַבָּא לִבְנֵי נַפְתָּלִי אֲחִירַע בַּר עֵינָן
verses.ar_en: On the day of the twelfth day, the leader of the sons of Naftali, Achirah the son of Einon.

verses.ar_he: קֻרְבָּנֵהּ מְגִסְתָּא דִכְסַף חֲדָא מְאָה וּתְלָתִין סִלְעִין הֲוָה מַתְקְלַהּ מִזְרְקָא חַד דִכְסַף מַתְקְלֵהּ שַׁבְעִין סִלְעִין בְּסִלְעֵי קוּדְשָׁא תַּרְוֵיהוֹן מְלַן סֻלְתָּא דְפִילָא בִמְשַׁח לְמִנְחָתָא
verses.ar_en: His offering was one silver tray its weight was one hundred thirty shekolim; one silver bowl [that weighed] seventy shekolim according to sanctuary weights. Both were filled with fine flour kneaded with [olive] oil, for a meal-offering.

verses.ar_he: בָּזִיכָא חֲדָא מַתְקַל עֲשַׂר סִלְעִין הִיא דִדְהַב מַלְיָא קְטֹרֶת בּוּסְמַיָא
verses.ar_en: One spoon of ten gold [shekolim], filled with incense.

verses.ar_he: תּוֹר חַד בַּר תּוֹרֵי דְכַר חַד אִמַר חַד בַּר שַׁתֵּהּ לַעֲלָתָא
verses.ar_en: One young bull, one ram, and one yearling sheep for a burnt-offering.

verses.ar_he: צְפִיר בַּר עִזִין חַד לְחַטָּאתָא
verses.ar_en: [And] one he-goat for a sin-offering.

verses.ar_he: וּלְנִכְסַת קוּדְשַׁיָא תּוֹרִין תְּרֵין דִכְרִין חַמְשָׁא גְדָיֵי חַמְשָׁא אִמְרִין בְּנֵי שַׁתָּא חַמְשָׁא דֵין קֻרְבַּן אֲחִירַע בַּר עֵינָן
verses.ar_en: For the peace-offering sacrifice, two oxen, five rams, five kids and five yearling sheep. This was the offering of Achirah the son of Einon.

verses.ar_he: דָא חֲנֻכַּת מַדְבְּחָא בְּיוֹמָא דְרַבִּיוּ יָתֵהּ מִן רַבְרְבֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל מְגִיסֵי כַסְפָּא תַּרְתָּא עַשְׂרֵי מִזְרְקֵי כַסְפָּא תְּרֵין עֲשַׂר בָּזִיכֵי דְדַהֲבָא תַּרְתָּא עַשְׂרֵי
verses.ar_en: This was the dedication of the altar on the day that it was anointed, given by the leaders of Israel; twelve silver trays twelve silver bowls and twelve golden spoons.

verses.ar_he: מְאָה וּתְלָתִין סִלְעִין הֲוָה מַתְקְלָא דִמְגִיסְתָּא חֲדָא דְכַסְפָּא וְשַׁבְעִין דְמִזְרְקָא חָד כֹּל כְּסַף מָנַיָא תְּרֵין אַלְפִין וְאַרְבַּע מְאָה בְּסִלְעֵי קוּדְשָׁא
verses.ar_en: One hundred thirty [shekolim was the weight of] each silver tray and each bowl weighed seventy [shekolim]. All the silver vessels weighed two thousand four hundred [shekolim] according to sanctuary weights.

verses.ar_he: בָּזִיכֵי דְדַהֲבָא תַּרְתֵּי עַשְׂרֵי מַלְיָן קְטֹרֶת בּוּסְמַיָא מַתְקַל עֲשַׂר סִלְעִין הֲוָה מַתְקְלָא דְבָזִיכָא בְּסִלְעֵי קוּדְשָׁא כָּל דְהַב בָּזִיכַיָא מְאָה וְעַשְׂרִין
verses.ar_en: Twelve golden spoons filled with [fragrant] incense; each spoon weighed ten [shekolim] according to sanctuary weights. The total of the golden spoons is one hundred twenty [shekolim].

verses.ar_he: כָּל תּוֹרֵי לַעֲלָתָא תְּרֵי עֲשַׂר תּוֹרִין דִכְרִין תְּרֵי עֲשַׂר אִמְרִין בְּנֵי שַׁתָּא תְּרֵי עֲשַׂר וּמִנְחַתְהוֹן וּצְפִירֵי בַּר עִזִין תְּרֵי עֲשַׂר לְחַטָאתָא
verses.ar_en: The total of the oxen for the burnt-offering is twelve oxen, twelve rams, twelve yearling sheep and their meal-offerings, and twelve he-goats for a sin-offering.

verses.ar_he: וְכֹל תּוֹרֵי לְנִכְסַת קוּדְשַׁיָא עַשְׂרִין וְאַרְבְּעָא תּוֹרִין דִכְרִין שִׁתִּין גַדְיַן שִׁתִּין אִמְרִין בְּנֵי שַׁתָּא שִׁתִּין דָא חֲנֻכַּת מַדְבְּחָא בָּתַר דְרַבִּיוּ יָתֵהּ
verses.ar_en: The total of the oxen for the peace [sacred]-offering sacrifice is twenty-four oxen, sixty rams, sixty kids and sixty yearling sheep. This was the dedication of the altar after it was anointed.

verses.ar_he: וְכַד עָלִיל משֶׁה לְמַשְׁכַּן זִמְנָא לְמַלָלָא עִמֵהּ וּשְׁמַע יָת קָלָא דְמִתְמַלֵל עִמֵהּ מֵעִלָוֵי כַפֻּרְתָּא דִי עַל אֲרוֹנָא דְסַהֲדוּתָא מִבֵּין תְּרֵין כְּרוּבַיָא וּמִתְמַלֵל עִמֵהּ
verses.ar_en: When Moshe would enter the Tent of Meeting to speak with Him (God), he would hear the Voice being spoken to him from above the Ark-cover which is atop the Ark of the Testimony from between the two cherubim; and He spoke to him.

verses.ar_he: וּמַלִיל יְיָ עִם משֶׁה לְמֵימָר
verses.ar_en: And Adonoy spoke to Moshe, saying;

verses.ar_he: מַלֵל עִם אַהֲרֹן וְתֵימַר לֵהּ בְּאַדְלָקוּתָךְ יָת בּוֹצִינַיָא לָקֳבֵל אַפֵּי מְנַרְתָּא יְהוֹן מְנַהֲרִין שִׁבְעָא בוֹצִינַיָא
verses.ar_en: Speak to Aharon, and say to him; When you light the lamps towards the face of the Menorah shall the seven lamps cast [their] light.

verses.ar_he: וַעֲבַד כֵּן אַהֲרֹן לָקֳבֵל אַפֵּי מְנַרְתָּא אַדְלֵק בּוֹצִינָהָא כְּמָא דִי פַקִיד יְיָ יָת משֶׁה
verses.ar_en: Aharon did so; towards the face of the Menorah he lit its lamps, just as Adonoy commanded Moshe.

verses.ar_he: וְדֵין עוֹבַד מְנַרְתָּא נְגִידָא דְהַב עַד שִׁידַהּ עַד שׁוֹשַׁנַהּ נְגִידָא הִיא כְּחֶזְוָא דִי אַחֲזֵי יְיָ יָת משֶׁה כֵּן עֲבַד יָת מְנַרְתָּא
verses.ar_en: This is how the Menorah was made; beaten from [a block of] gold, from its base until its flowers it is beaten out [of a solid block], according to the vision which Adonoy showed to Moshe, so he made the Menorah.
